item.description:
This place sounds really fun, and I'm all about trying as many new places in this area as possible! Check out their website to get directions and see some pics. They have a bunch of cheap grub? and it will give us an opportunity to get together in Watertown.

If you have any questions, let me know. :)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll send my cell phone number around so ya'll can find me.
item.why: It's always a good time when this group gets together!
item.name: Drinks at Donohue's
